name: Blackbird - Rook - Gran ToroÂ
additionalNotes: A mild, creamy smoke, Blackbird Rook is hand crafted in the Dominican Republic. The Rook has a nice, brown Sumatra wrapper that rests over a Dominican Habano binder, which has a specially blended filler made of Dominican and Nicaraguan tobaccos. The Blackbird Rook has a very alluring aroma and an undeniably sweet taste.
